title: The creator of Luther is writing the script for a remake of Escape From New York
text:
The creator of Luther is writing the script for a remake of Escape From New York 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Neil Cross, the creator of the hit BBC crime drama Luther, will pen the screenplay for 20th Century Fox's upcoming remake of John Carpenter'...
